Text: some pretty disturbing stuff going on here.  If you have a weak stomach don't watch.

Flower of Flesh & Blood is absolutely ridiculous.  Disgusting film.  Issei Sagawa must have inspired this film.
I actually find it quite funny as well, because it is so unreal, yet done so well.  Quite a mind-fuck.
Good up, classic 'snuff' style film.  Many people (including Charlie Sheen) believed this was real.
Wtf? was Sheen seeking out snuff films? Weirdo.
